action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Each of us can ask 3 questions. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: A black bear is captured in a natural habitat, walking alone on all fours through a dense green underbrush with sporadic yellow flowers. The bear's head is turned slightly to its right, nose near the ground, sniffing or observing its surroundings. The background is a mix of bushes, trees, and a clear blue sky, indicative of a sunny day.

I now await your description of the image you have access to, so we can proceed with the guessing game.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Each of us can ask 3 questions. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: An adult black bear in the dense forest brush, captured from a low angle looking upwards, with no visible human artifacts in the scene. The bear is the main subject, with its fur, eyes, and movement being the key features to note in determining if the image is the same as the one in possession of the other player."

This is my DESCRIPTION: A black bear is captured in a natural habitat, walking alone on all fours through a dense green underbrush with sporadic yellow flowers. The bear's head is turned slightly to its right, nose near the ground, sniffing or observing its surroundings. The background is a mix of bushes, trees, and a clear blue sky, indicative of a sunny day.

I now await your description of the image you have access to, so we can proceed with the guessing game.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: A mature black bear in a natural, untamed forest, with no visible human-made objects or paths disturbing its habitat. The bear is the focal point, with its eyes, fur, and body posture crucial to determining the image's identity.

QUESTION: Can you describe any additional characteristics or context not mentioned in your description that could help confirm if the images are the same?"
